contentrichtext.text: '''Christopher Lawrence''' or '''Chris Lawrence''' may refer to: *[[Chris Lawrence (ice hockey)]] (born 1987), Canadian professional ice hockey *[[Chris Lawrence (racing driver)]] (1933â€“2011), British racing driver *[[Chris Lawrence (rugby league)]] (born 1988), Australian professional rugby league player *[[Christopher Lawrence (DJ)]], American disc jockey and music producer *[[Mark Christopher Lawrence]] (born 1964), American character actor *[[Christopher Lawrence (broadcaster)]] Australian classical music broadcaster ==See also== *[[Chris Laurence]] (born 1949), English jazz double bassist {{hndis|Lawrence, Christopher}}
